statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.InfoNoticeItemID , AA.InfoNoticeValue
FROM dbo.TGoodsInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.InfoNoticeItemID , AA.InfoNoticeValue
FROM dbo.TGoodsInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TGoodsInfoNotice ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, GoodsID, InfoNoticeItemID, InfoNoticeValue ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #GoodsID#, #InfoNoticeItemID#, #InfoNoticeValue# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TGoodsInfoNotice SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , InfoNoticeItemID= #InfoNoticeItemID# , InfoNoticeValue = #InfoNoticeValue# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B2.SortOrder, B2.ID) AS RowNo , CC.ID , CC.CreatedOn , CC.CreatedBy , CC.CreatedByName , CC.UpdatedOn , CC.UpdatedBy , CC.UpdatedByName
, CC.GoodsID as GoodsID , B2.ID as InfoNoticeItemID , B2.ItemName as InfoNoticeItemName , CC.InfoNoticeValue as InfoNoticeValue
FROM dbo.TCategory AA INNER JOIN dbo.TInfoNotice B1 ON AA.InfoNoticeID = B1.ID INNER JOIN dbo.TInfoNoticeItem B2 ON B1.ID = B2.InfoNoticeID LEFT JOIN dbo.TGoodsInfoNotice CC ON B2.ID = CC.InfoNoticeItemID AND CC.GoodsID = #GoodsID# WHERE AA.ID = #CategoryID# AND B1.UseYn = 'Y' AND B2.UseYn = 'Y' ORDER BY RowNo
